mapper.select: SELECT * FROM injoy."file" f inner join injoy."user" u on f."userId" = u."id" where "projectId" = #{projectId} and "folderId" = #{folderId};
SELECT * FROM injoy."file" f inner join injoy."user" u on f."userId" = u."id" where "projectId" = #{projectId} and "fileName" like concat('%', #{keyword},'%');
mapper.update: UPDATE injoy.file SET "folderId" = ( SELECT f1."folderId" FROM injoy.folder f1 inner join (SELECT "folderId", "folderRoot" || "folderName" root FROM injoy.folder) f2 on f1."folderId" = f2."folderId" where root = #{root} ) WHERE "fileId" =#{fileId} ;
